text: Anne Nicol Gaylor (November 25, 1926 â€“ June 14, 2015) was an American atheist and reproductive rights advocate. She co-founded the Freedom from Religion Foundation and an abortion fund for Wisconsin women. She wrote the book Abortion Is a Blessing and edited The World Famous Atheist Cookbook. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:American activists Category:Writers from Wisconsin
